_sText: Map made for KSF Portuguese Community. Thanks to Killa for giving me the chance to make this map. I had to make some changes in the map to adapt it better to sniper map style. I removed some props, and also opened other ways of shooting like windows and many other things. Extra: there are some hidden grenades all arround the map. Try to find them! :D Credits: Valve for the map De_Inferno.
